reporting-org.narrative: UK - Foreign, Commonwealth and Development Office

title.narrative: Promoting development of green principles in Chinese healthcare, including in infrastructure and service delivery to support sustainable healthcare

description.narrative: The project is designed to allow the Chinese government to draw upon UK experience to promote the development of green health and care systems which support intelligent, resilient and sustainable healthcare. It will achieve this by running provincial level pilot initiatives to strengthen the function of health management and promote green infrastructure, operation and service delivery. A final workshop will present to Chinese Ministries an overview of international case studies on sustainable healthcare, including from the UK, and will generate options for China's adoption of green principles in its healthcare systems.

participating-org.narrative: UK - Foreign, Commonwealth and Development Office

mailing-address.narrative: Public Enquiry Point, Abercrombie House, Eaglesham Road, East Kilbride, Glasgow G75 8EA
